name: Quiet as a Stone
description: Remake the world in this minimalistic slow game for casual creators. Discover a long lost history. Create your own scenes. Explore atmospheric countryside vignettes. Sit by Campfires. Relaxing ambient soundscapes with satisfying interactions. Extensive photography mode. Embrace impermanence.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 750 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Current gaming PC or laptop highly recommended.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 980ti Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Current gaming PC or laptop highly recommended.
